external_games.name: Jigsaw Puzzles Infinite - Cats & Dogs Puzzle Pack

name: Jigsaw Puzzles Infinite: Cats & Dogs Puzzle Pack
summary: Sit back, relax and build puzzles to your heart's content. Assemble one of the many included puzzles, or add your own images. Customize size and shape of the pieces for any puzzle. Enjoy Classic mode or try out Zen mode for a new type of puzzle experience.
